headline: Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM): Among Value Stocks in Ken Fisher’s Portfolio
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Value Stocks in Ken Fisher’s Portfolio. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) stands against other value stocks in Ken Fisher’s portfolio. Trump’s “stupid” tariffs will fail; that’s the sentiment echoed by billionaire investor Ken Fisher as their impact […]
